item.title: Binscatter for R
item.author: timothy.lin@alumni.ubc.ca (Timothy Lin)
item.description: I was trying to find an R package that provides features similar to Stataâ€™s binscatter user written program but there does not appear to be any good substitutes around. Hence, I decided to write a function that replicates it in R. Turns out it actually took longer than I thought and there are still many bugs to fix but the developmental version is worth sharing. It can be downloaded from my Github page.
